nodes.short_description: ¡16 deportes en 1 juego! ¿Qué tipo de actividades deportivas serán más seguras durante la era de la pandemia? All in One Sports ofrece la forma más segura de mantenerte saludable tanto física como mentalmente sin contacto.

16 Sportarten in 1 Spiel! Welche Art von Sportaktivitäten wird während der Pandemie sicherer sein? All in One Sport bietet die sicherste Möglichkeit, Sie körperlich und geistig ohne Kontakt gesund zu halten.

16 sport in 1 gioco! Che tipo di attività sportive saranno più sicure durante l'era della pandemia? La realtà virtuale sportiva All in One offre il modo più sicuro per mantenerti in salute sia fisicamente che mentalmente senza contatto.
16 가지 스포츠게임을 '올인원 스포츠' 하나로 ! 16 개의 인기 스포츠 게임을 하나의 타이틀로 통합 개발하였습니다. 비대면 가상현실 스포츠를 안전하고 리얼하게 즐길 수있는 최고의 선택입니다.

16 sports en 1 jeu! Quels types d'activités sportives seront plus sûrs pendant l'ère de la pandémie? All in One Sports offre le moyen le plus sûr de vous garder en bonne santé physiquement et mentalement sans contact.

16 Sports in 1 Game!
Looking for safe and fun ways to stay active during the pandemic era?
All-In-One Sports offers a zero-contact, health-boosting experience — both physically and mentally.
And now, with the newly added Mixed Reality (MR) mode, you can enjoy select sports blended into your real environment, making the experience even more immersive and connected.

nodes.display_name: Все-В-Одном Cпорт /All In One Sports VR
nodes.short_description: 16 видов спорта в 1 игре! Какой вид спорта будет безопаснее в эпоху пандемии? All in One Sports предлагает самый безопасный способ сохранить здоровье как физически, так и морально без каких-либо контактов.

nodes.display_name: 多合一運動 /All In One Sports
nodes.short_description: 16 款運動集於一身！在疫情時期，哪種運動更安全？All in One Sports 提供最安全的零接觸方式，讓您在身心方面都保持健康。

nodes.display_name: オールインワン・スポーツ /All In One Sports
nodes.short_description: 1ゲームで16スポーツ！ パンデミックの時代には、どのような種類のスポーツ活動がより安全になりますか？ オールインワンスポーツは、身体的および精神的に健康を維持するための最も安全な方法を提供します。
16 sporten in 1 spel! Welke sportactiviteiten zijn veiliger tijdens het pandemietijdperk? All in One Sports biedt de meest veilige manier om je fysiek en mentaal gezond te houden zonder contact.

16 esportes em um jogo! Que tipo de atividades esportivas serão mais seguras durante a era da pandemia? All in One Sports oferece a maneira mais segura de mantê-lo saudável, tanto física quanto mentalmente, com contato zero.

nodes.display_name: 多合一运动 /All In One Sports
nodes.short_description: 1场比赛16项运动！疫情时代，哪种运动会更安全？多合一运动 提供了一种无需任何接触即可保持身心健康的最安全方式。

nodes.long_description:
■ A variety of sports titles experiences
- Baseball, Archery, Ping Pong, Basketball, Bowling, Badminton, Golf, Dart, Billiard, Boxing

■ Real time PvP by multiplay
- boxing, baseball and table tennis are not yet supported

■ Realistic virtual sports experiences by advanced physics

■ Player customization

■ Simple UI and easy control can help anyone to play

■ 5 different difficulties from beginner to professional

* The game format is the same as the official Olympic rules, so you can learn sports training and rules.
* Suitable for virtual reality sports classrooms that must be conducted indoors due to physical education facilities and weather conditions.
nodes.short_description: 10 Sports in 1 Game ! What type of sports acitivities will be safer during the pandemic era? All in One sports VR offers the most safe way to keep you healthy for both physically and mentally with zero contact.

nodes.change_log:
Hotfix Update Notice (Baseball Score Bug Fix)

Hello, this is the Appnori Development Team.

First of all, we sincerely apologize for the recent issue where scores in Baseball mode were recorded incorrectly, sometimes assigning your points to the opponent or vice versa.
We have quickly identified and resolved the issue, and have released a hotfix update today to address it.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused, and we will continue to do our best to provide a better gaming experience.

Thank you.
– Appnori Development Team

Hello players,
It’s been a while since our last update. Thank you so much for your patience and continued support!
The 1.6.1 update is now live, bringing exciting new content, improved gameplay mechanics, and important bug fixes.
★ Update Highlights
● New Game Mode: 3-Cushion Billiards
A challenging and strategic billiards mode for experienced players.
● Improved Bowling Physics
Enhanced realism in ball spin, friction, and pin collision.
● Global Matchmaking Server Selection
Choose from multiple regions such as Asia, North America, and Europe for smoother gameplay and better connectivity.
● Improved Ball Collision in Billiards
Fixed an issue where balls reacted before actual contact.
★ Bug Fixes
● Fixed an issue where Four-Ball Billiards Level 5 could not progress.
● Fixed a bug where the support line remained visible after leveling up in billiards.
We’re committed to improving your experience with each update.
Enjoy the new content and stay tuned for more!
– Appnori Team
